experience.title: Product Owner
experience.description: ‚Ä¢  Devised opportunity hypothesis and product implementation strategy for the innovative Crypto Tax Calculator, leading a cross-functional team of 2 CAs.‚Ä¢  Drove outbound business development for Sandbox, excelling in lead prospecting, negotiation, and deal closure.‚Ä¢ Directed marketing efforts for Sandbox, Quicko's SaaS offering, by creating compelling blog posts, migrating API documentation to an enhanced platform improvement in functionality and analytics, and designing engaging social media posts, demonstrating expertise in content creation and digital marketing.‚Ä¢ Initiated and organized a podcast series centred on building and scaling API-first companies, featuring industry experts like Kailash Nadh, CTO of Zerodha, as the inaugural guest, attracting over 6,000+ unique listens and fostering valuable networking opportunities, displaying strong networking and content curation skills.
